title: GCash Pera Outlet GPO Plus Advisory
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [GCash Pro Platform Termination](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45732029791513-GCash-Pro-Platform-Termination)
- [Advisory on Automated Fuel Dispenser (Self-Service Gas Pumps) Payments using GCash Cards](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/44449603684377-Advisory-on-Automated-Fuel-Dispenser-Self-Service-Gas-Pumps-Payments-using-GCash-Cards)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Ang bagong **GCash Pera Outlet (GPO) Plus** mobile app ay may mga bagong features at updates sa iyong experience bilang GPO partner.

Basahin ang sumusunod para malaman ang mga features ng bagong app

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/37831595306009)![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/37831595313177)

**Ano ang mga benefits ng bagong GPO mobile app?**

- Mas maraming fund-in options
- Additional billers
- All load partners now available
- Mas mabilis na approval (2-3 days)
- Assisted onboarding ng agent para siguradong tamang documents ang maipasa.
- 14 day trial period

## Tungkol sa bagong GPO

Ano ang mga features ng bagong app?

**Available Features**:

- Pa-Cash In
- Pa-Cash Out
- Send Load
- Pay Bills

**Coming Soon**:

- Gumawa ng QR
- Dagdag Pondo

**Ano'ng Bago?**

- **Updated Dashboard**: Mas madali ang navigation.
- **Total Earnings Target Tracker**: Pwede ka nang mag-set at mag-track ng target earnings kada buwan.
- **Additional Fund-In Partners**:
  - DSP Agent / Distributor Fund-In
  - **Mga Bagong Partners**:
    - 711
    - ECPAY (Listahan ng Accredited ECPay Merchant Partners)
    - Online Banking (Listahan ng Bank Partners)
- **Wallet History**: Buong record ng iyong wallet transactions.
- **Additional Billers**: Over 500+ biller partners na pagpipilian.
- **Additional Load Partners**: Maari na mag offer ng load to ALL networks
- **My Suki**: Maaring i-save ang details ng iyong Suki para maiwasan ang pagpapadala ng transactions sa maling recipient.
- **My Kita**: Mabilis na ma-monitor ang iyong kita.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/37831595317145)![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/37831595322265)![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/37831617282841)![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/37831617286169)

Paano ko ipopondohan ang bagong GPO wallet?

- Ang iyong bagong GPO account ay magsisimula sa **zero balance**.
- Pumili mula sa existing fund-in methods o kontakin ang iyong [**Distributor**](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/8933242417817). **Dagdag Pondo** ay kasama dito
